common.graph.graph

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.CObject
      • common.graph.AbstractEdge<T>
        • common.graph.graph.EdgeTemplate<Vertex>
          • common.graph.graph.Edge

  • public class Edge
extends EdgeTemplate<Vertex>
    The Edge class is a class representing the edge(s) of a Graph.
    Author:
    Vincent Mirian
    Date:
    Oct 26, 2017

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Edge()
      Initializes a newly created Edge
      Edge(Edge other)
      Initializes a newly created Edge with its contents set to those of other.
      Edge(Vertex Src, Vertex Dst)
      Initializes a newly created Edge with its source node defined by parameter Src and its destination node define by parameter Dst
